Entries.Introduction: It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}, the local doctor.#$e#I perform regular check-ups and medical procedures for all the residents of Pelican Town. It's rewarding work.#$e#I hope you'll find your own work equally rewarding, in time.$h
Entries.event_george1: Thanks, @.$h#$b#You see, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}}, I'm just trying to help you.
Entries.event_george2: *Sigh*$s#$b#Look, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}}. If you want to behave like this I'm going to have to tell your wife. I don't think she'll be happy.

Entries.Outdoor_2: I may not be the most exciting {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Guy:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}}, but I'll stay loyal to you for the rest of my life.$l
Entries.OneKid_3: So far, I really like being a {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Father:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}}!$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: My life is devoted to you and the children now, and I'm very happy about it. I always dreamed of having a wonderful family.$l#$e#I had nightmares of being a {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Bachelor:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}} forever.... I love you so much.$l
Entries.summer_1: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, dear! It's very dangerous for your skin.$8#$e#As your {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}} and doctor, I consider your health and safety my top priority!

AfterMovie.Text: I have a fear of heights, so those soaring aerial shots really got to me... Still, I had a good time overall.$h

BeforeMovie.Text: This movie seems a little intense for me...$s

AfterMovie.Text: My body feels inflamed after that movie...$s
